HoopWorld.title: HoopWorld - Arcade Basketball Game
HoopWorld.description: Play HoopWorld online! Fast-paced arcade basketball with tight controls, power dunks, and clutch blocks. Jump in, throw it down, and win the game!

HomeIframe.title: Play HoopWorld Online
HomeIframe.description: Fast-paced arcade basketball. Pick a player, time your jumps, and throw down huge dunks to win.

HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: HoopWorld is a fast‑paced arcade basketball game built for quick matches and over‑the‑top plays.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Pick a player or team with your preferred style
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: Use Arrow/WASD to move, Space to jump, then shoot or dunk
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Time blocks, steals, and power moves to outscore your rival
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Tight controls and responsive physics keep every possession exciting
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Alley‑oops, blocks, and power dunks to swing momentum
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Go head‑to‑head with a friend or take on the AI
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Smooth animations and clear court presentation
